title: Bitter-sweet beetroot with sexy spinach quinoa
ingredients: ['4 fresh raw beetroot', '2 tablespoons balsamic venegar', '2 tablespoons honey (or agave nectar for vegans)', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 orange pepper (or any colour!)', '1 clove of garlic, pressed or finely chopped', '75g fresh spinach', '250g quinoa (dry uncooked weight)', '600ml hot vegetable stock (I use gluten free bouillon powder)']
